revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Archer_C7(UN_V1-01.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC1750 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.tp-link.com/baltic/home-networking/wifi-router/archer-c7/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = http://www.tp-link.com/en/support/download/?model=Archer+C7&version=V1 |wikidevi = TP-LINK_Archer_C7_v1.x |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = Archer C7 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1.x |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/22/2013‎ |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/TP-LINK Archer C7 v1.x |wlclass = AC1750 |series = Archer C7 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7C7 |icid = 8853A-C7 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 2050500351 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A, PPB417.002B, 1323, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 720 <!-- 720 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q64FVSIG; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5PS5162GFR-Y5C; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8327N;AR8327N-BL1A, E56654.2B, 1330, TAIWAN; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 64:66:B3 |oui = 64:66:B3
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.31;LSDK-9.2.0_U6.616;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 2.4 GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2574BL-R;574B, 337C;3; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L1;5003L1, 3238L, 1323 MY;3; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = TP-LINK_2.4GHz_XXXXXX, TP-LINK_5GHz_XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^TP-LINK_2.4GHz_[A-F0-9]{6}$,,, ^TP-LINK_5GHz_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/15/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 845973070601 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00BUSDVBQ |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = none |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad2modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880-AR1A;QCA9880-AR1A, NFH093.00B, 1318, TAIWAN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *"2050500332" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. *"2052500400" is silkscreened on the back of the wireless module. This device is basically a [[TP-LINK TL-WDR7500 v2.x]] (Archer C7R) :with 3 external and 3 internal antennas. Default settings are per ''TP-LINK'''s manual.
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.tp-link.us/resources/document/Archer_C7_V1_User_Guide.pdf User Guide] *[http://www.tp-link.com/resources/simulator/Archer_C7/index.htm Interface simulator]
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32196-tp-link-archer-c7-ac1750-wireless-dual-band-gigabit-router-reviewed ''Reviewed (favorably)'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :"2050500351" is silkscreened on the board. :The Flash chip is noted as an 8 MB '''Winbond''' W25Q64FV. :The 5GHz PAMs are noted as ''[[Skyworks]]'' (''SiGe'') SE5005L *[http://nl.hardware.info/reviews/4680/2/tp-link-archer-c7-review-80211ac-voor-een-schappelijke-prijs-qualcomm-in-plaats-van-broadcom ''Review'' on '''nl.hardware.info'''] :"2050500351" is silkscreened on the board. :The wireless module appears to be using QCA9880-AR1A ::[http://nl.hardware.info/nieuws/33842/cebit-twee-80211ac-ac1750-routers-bij-tp-link Their ''CeBIT'' article on the device] *[http://forums.overclockers.co.uk/showthread.php?p=24424655 ''Review of the device by '''Locky'''''] on the '''overclockers.co.uk''' forums :(excellent pictures [internal and non]) :"2050500332" is silkscreened on the board. :v1.0 board, '''GTT''' capacitors, using: :QCA9558-AT4A + QCA9880-AR1A + AR8327N-BL1A *[http://www.withoutthesarcasm.com/tp-link-archer-c7-ac1750-wireless-router-review/ ''Review'' on '''withoutthesarcasm.com'''] :OUI: 64:66:B3 *[http://www.hkepc.com/9324 On '''hkepc.com'''] :"2050500332" is silkscreened on the board. :OUI: F8:1A:67
===Wikis / Forums / MLs=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wdr7500 ''TP-Link TL-WDR7500 / TP-Link Archer C7 AC1750''] on the '''OpenWrt Wiki''' :[https://lists.ath9k.org/pipermail/ath9k-devel/2013-June/011828.html Per ''sujith'' on ''ath9k-devel'', the card in the ''Archer C7'' is a '''CUS223 v1.0''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_archer_c7_ac1750_v1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/archer_c7 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/archer-c7-v1-0-crashes-on-boot/19784/41 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ar71xx-ath79 |subtarget = generic |arch = mips_24kc |support_started_version = 14.07 |current_supported_version = <!-- auto --> |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:Archer_C7(UN_V1-01.jpg File:Archer_C7(UN_V1-02.jpg File:Archer_C7(UN_V1-03.jpg </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]] <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="external"> File:TP-LINK_Archer_C7_v1p1_unit_front_panel.jpg File:TP-LINK_Archer_C7_v1p1_unit_back_noANT.jpg File:TP-LINK_Archer_C7_v1p1_unit_bottom.jpg </gallery>{{#set:Has images=label|Has images=external}}
<gallery caption="internal" mode="slideshow"> File:TP-LINK_Archer_C7_v1p1_board_top_1.jpg|board top, in case File:TP-LINK_Archer_C7_v1p1_board_top_2.jpg|board top, card removed File:TP-LINK_Archer_C7_v1p1_Flash.jpg|Flash File:TP-LINK_Archer_C7_v1p1_ac_wi_module.jpg|11ac wireless module File:TP-LINK_Archer_C7_v1p1_ac_wi_module_out.jpg|11ac wireless module, removed File:TP-LINK_Archer_C7_v1p1_ac_wi_module_back.jpg|11ac wireless module, back File:TP-LINK_Archer_C7_v1p1_QCA9558-AT4A.jpg|QCA9558-AT4A File:TP-LINK_Archer_C7_v1p1_QCA9558+RF_top.jpg|QCA9558+RF File:TP-LINK_Archer_C7_v1p1_QCA9880-AR1A.jpg|QCA9880-AR1A File:TP-LINK_Archer_C7_v1p1_QCA9880-AR1A_2.jpg|QCA9880-AR1A again File:TP-LINK_Archer_C7_v1p1_unpopulated_headers.jpg|unpopulated headers File:TP-LINK_Archer_C7_v1p1_board_bot.jpg|board bottom File:TP-LINK_Archer_C7_v1p1_board_PN.jpg|board PN File:TP-LINK_Archer_C7_v1p1_board_label.jpg|board label </gallery></center>{{#set:Has images=internal}}
==Notes== ===Additional specifications=== {{SCollapse|per ''TP-LINK'''s specs | *''EIRP:'' < 20dBm *''Receiver sensitivity'' *5GHz :11a 6Mbps: -96dBm :11a 54Mbps: -79dBm :11ac HT20: -71dBm :11ac HT40: -66dBm :11ac HT80: -63dBm *2.4GHz :11g 54M: -77dBm :11n HT20: -74dBm :11n HT40: -72dBm }}
===Probable used PSU(s)=== The power supply in the FCC external photos :is a '''TenPao''' S040EU1200250.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = TenPao |model = S040EU1200250 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=1.2 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=2.5 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel }}
